mapper.select: SELECT c.cid, c.cname, t.tid, t.tname, sct.grade, c.ccredit FROM studentms.score sct INNER JOIN studentms.teacher t ON sct.tid = t.tid INNER JOIN studentms.course c ON sct.cid = c.cid WHERE sct.sid = #{sid} AND sct.term = #{term}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO studentms.score (sid, cid, tid, term, usual_grade, final_grade, total_grade, class_id, major_id, department_id) VALUES
(#{item.sid}, #{item.cid}, #{item.tid}, #{item.term}, #{item.usualGrade}, #{item.finalGrade}, #{item.totalGrade}, #{item.classId}, #{item.majorId}, #{item.departmentId})
